Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Ankhef(en)mut with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: SLAntiq (number still to be ascertained)
